Title: ServiceTitan Introducing the Next Evolution of AI at Pantheon 2025 Keynote Sessions
Summary: Atlas acts like the ultimate power user of ServiceTitan, and over time will have the capabilities to handle many of the tasks, insights, and decisions a business owner or team member could make.

Title: HARDI: Effort to Save Home Efficiency Credit Likely to Fail
Summary: Alex Ayers, vice president of government affairs at Heating, Air Conditioning & Refrigeration Distributors International (HARDI), said he doesn't want the Democrats' efforts to mislead consumers or contractors into thinking they'll be able to use 25C after this year.

Title: Longtime HVAC Executive Robert Engel, Jr. Retires
Summary: The successor to a business started by his father, Robert Engel, Sr., he has been a noted member of the HVAC community throughout the region. Engel grew up in the business, focused on supporting the success of area independent HVAC contractors.

Title: Ruskin Relaunches XP500 Aluminum Extreme Weather Louver
Summary: The XP500 is a stationary extreme weather louver with sight-proof blades.
